title: Business Strategy Practice Competency Enhancement: Fundamentals and Applications of Wireless Charging Edge AI

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Fundamental Artificial Intelligence Concepts and Wireless Charging Technology
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Explain the energy harvesting (EH) principles of wireless charging technology and propose methods for application in edge computing environments

Within 3 weeks, learners manipulate 3 core variables (energy quota, knowledge-sharing rate, reward weight) of an energy-knowledge trading incentive mechanism using distributed learning simulation tools (e.g., AnyLogic, NetLogo), analyze simulation graphs, and propose 1 optimal incentive combination.
Propose a design framework for sustainable edge AI systems utilizing blockchain-based P2P energy sharing models

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
